item.title: Conference Bridge to Everywhere
item.description: Conference bridges connect multiple phone lines, allowing people in different locations to talk together. While large companies might buy this equipment, it’s more affordable for others to pay as they go. CogniConference is a budget-friendly service for organizing and participating in conference calls. It works well for audio-only calls using speakerphones or handsets. Additionally, it can provide audio for web conferences using tools like GotoMeeting. While managed teleconferencing can be pricey, CogniConference aims for affordability, flexibility, and high-quality.
